CustomField.description: Check if there is an Navision account for this oppty in the Opportunity owner's country. Used to determine if contract upload is possible. Do not delete!
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND(Account.Navision_Customer_NO__c = false, Owner.Country = 'Norway'), AND(Account.Navision_Customer_SE__c = false, Owner.Country = 'Sweden'), AND(Account.Navision_Customer_DK__c = false, Owner.Country = 'Denmark') ), false, true)
CustomField.label: Navision Account in Owners Country
